title: "Make It Fiction...": Elon Musk Makes 'Orwell' Jab At Senior NATO Official
content: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk accused a senior NATO officer of Orwellian tendencies in a post on X Wednesday, a day after Donald Trump named the world's richest man to a top government post.
summary: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk accused a senior NATO officer of Orwellian tendencies in a post on X Wednesday, a day after Donald Trump named the world's richest man to a top government post.

title: World's Longest Nonstop Flights To Get $821 Million Luxury Upgrade
content: The world's longest nonstop commercial flights are getting a major upgrade. Singapore Airlines (SIA) recently announced a multi-year program worth 1.1 billion Singapore dollars (about $821 million).
summary: The world's longest nonstop commercial flights are getting a major upgrade. Singapore Airlines (SIA) recently announced a multi-year program worth 1.1 billion Singapore dollars (about $821 million).

title: Bob Lee's Accused Killer Says Tech Executive "Went Crazy On Me"
content: Technology executive Bob Lee's accused killer told a jury he acted in self-defense after Lee tried to attack him with a knife on a San Francisco street a year and a half ago, saying "he went crazy on me" after losing his temper.
summary: Technology executive Bob Lee's accused killer told a jury he acted in self-defense after Lee tried to attack him with a knife on a San Francisco street a year and a half ago, saying "he went crazy on me" after losing his temper.

title: Biden, Xi To Meet In Peru This Week As World Leaders Shift Focus To Trump
content: US President Joe Biden will meet his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, in Peru on Saturday for the last of three in-person sit-downs between the leaders during the US president's term in office.
summary: US President Joe Biden will meet his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, in Peru on Saturday for the last of three in-person sit-downs between the leaders during the US president's term in office.

title: Father Of British-Pak Girl Beat Her As She Lay Dying; She Had 25 Broken Bones
content: The father of a 10-year-old British-Pakistani girl on Wednesday admitted that he killed his daughter but maintained he had not meant to harm her, even as he beat her when she lay dying.
summary: The father of a 10-year-old British-Pakistani girl on Wednesday admitted that he killed his daughter but maintained he had not meant to harm her, even as he beat her when she lay dying.

title: FBI Seizes Polymarket CEO's Phones After Platform Predicts Trump's Win
content: A source said that the government is allegedly trying to accuse Polymarket of market manipulation and rigging its polls in favour of Trump.
summary: A source said that the government is allegedly trying to accuse Polymarket of market manipulation and rigging its polls in favour of Trump.

title: Men Dressed As Bears Destroy Their Own Luxury Cars For Insurance Money
content: Four people who allegedly dressed as bears and damaged their own luxury cars in a bid to defraud insurance companies were arrested in the US state of California on Wednesday.
summary: Four people who allegedly dressed as bears and damaged their own luxury cars in a bid to defraud insurance companies were arrested in the US state of California on Wednesday.

title: California Family Of Autistic Boy, Assaulted By Mercedes Driver, Gifted SUV
content: A 10-year-old autistic boy from California who was slapped by an irate Mercedes driver a few months ago received the surprise of his life recently when he was given an SUV.
summary: A 10-year-old autistic boy from California who was slapped by an irate Mercedes driver a few months ago received the surprise of his life recently when he was given an SUV.

title: Italy's 12th century Castle Revival Brings Luxury To Umbrian Countryside
content: Umbria's Castle of Antognolla will soon transform into a Six Senses luxury resort.
summary: Umbria's Castle of Antognolla will soon transform into a Six Senses luxury resort.

title: US Tourist Found Dead At Luxury Hotel In Ireland Frequented By Celebrities
content: According to the Garda Siochana, Ireland's national police and security service, the US citizen was discovered unconscious on a bathroom floor Tuesday evening
summary: According to the Garda Siochana, Ireland's national police and security service, the US citizen was discovered unconscious on a bathroom floor Tuesday evening

title: What Melania Trump Said About Jill Biden's Call Post Trump Assassination Attempt
content: Jill Biden reached out to Melania Trump after an assassination attempt on her husband Donald Trump in Pennsylvania's Butler City on July 13 this year.
summary: Jill Biden reached out to Melania Trump after an assassination attempt on her husband Donald Trump in Pennsylvania's Butler City on July 13 this year.

title: Renowned Yoga Instructor Sharath Jois Dies Of Heart Attack In US
content: Sharath Jois, a renowned yoga instructor and the grandson of yoga legend Krishna Pattabhi Jois, died on Monday in Virginia, US. He was 53 years old.
summary: Sharath Jois, a renowned yoga instructor and the grandson of yoga legend Krishna Pattabhi Jois, died on Monday in Virginia, US. He was 53 years old.

title: 10 Most Climate-Vulnerable Countries Got Less Than $1 Year Climate Finance: Report
content: As world leaders meet at the 2024 UN climate conference (COP29) in Azerbaijan, a new report by an international development agency on Thursday said people living in 10 most climate-vulnerable countries received less than $1 a year in climate finance.
summary: As world leaders meet at the 2024 UN climate conference (COP29) in Azerbaijan, a new report by an international development agency on Thursday said people living in 10 most climate-vulnerable countries received less than $1 a year in climate finance.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy's Old Speech Goes Viral Ahead Of 'DOGE' Appointment
content: The viral video features young Vivek Ramaswamy, then an 18-year-old student at St Xavier High School, reflecting on his journey through high school.
summary: The viral video features young Vivek Ramaswamy, then an 18-year-old student at St Xavier High School, reflecting on his journey through high school.

title: Man With Explosives Tries To Enter Brazil Supreme Court, Dies In Blast
content: A man with explosives died Wednesday trying to enter Brazil's Supreme Court in what appeared to be a suicide, officials said, days before the country hosts the G20 summit.
summary: A man with explosives died Wednesday trying to enter Brazil's Supreme Court in what appeared to be a suicide, officials said, days before the country hosts the G20 summit.

title: Mysterious Diamond Necklace Linked To Marie Antoinette Sells For $4.8 Million
content: A mysterious necklace laden with some 500 diamonds and with possible links to a scandal that contributed to the downfall of Marie Antoinette, sold for $4.8 million at an auction in Geneva Wednesday.
summary: A mysterious necklace laden with some 500 diamonds and with possible links to a scandal that contributed to the downfall of Marie Antoinette, sold for $4.8 million at an auction in Geneva Wednesday.

title: UK-Based Russian Chef Who Criticised Putin Found Dead In Serbia Hotel
content: A Russian television chef, who was an outspoken critic of President Vladimir Putin's war in Ukraine, has been found dead in Serbia, the BBC reported.
summary: A Russian television chef, who was an outspoken critic of President Vladimir Putin's war in Ukraine, has been found dead in Serbia, the BBC reported.

title: 'Nostradamus' Of US Polls Blames Musk, Disinformation For Wrong Prediction
content: Allan Lichtman, often dubbed the "Nostradamus" of US Presidential Polls, is blaming the "explosion" of disinformation and billionaire Elon Musk for his incorrect prediction that Kamala Harris would win the 2024 election.
summary: Allan Lichtman, often dubbed the "Nostradamus" of US Presidential Polls, is blaming the "explosion" of disinformation and billionaire Elon Musk for his incorrect prediction that Kamala Harris would win the 2024 election.

title: Sri Lanka Heads For Snap Elections Today, Results Likely On Friday
content: Sri Lanka votes today in a second national election in as many months with a deeply divided opposition struggling to recover from a crushing defeat at presidential polls.
summary: Sri Lanka votes today in a second national election in as many months with a deeply divided opposition struggling to recover from a crushing defeat at presidential polls.

title: Trump Tracker: Ex-Democrat Tulsi Gabbard Appointed US Intelligence Chief
content: Donald Trump is set to return to the White House after his victory over Kamala Harris in the November 5 US presidential elections. The 78-year-old leader Republican has secured all seven swing states.
summary: Donald Trump is set to return to the White House after his victory over Kamala Harris in the November 5 US presidential elections. The 78-year-old leader Republican has secured all seven swing states.
